message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm asking $160 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $160 is my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $140. I believe this product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
